name: RTS Defender
description:
In order to play the game you will need to have at least 2 players - and have a steam account - you add the game to your Steam library and you and your friends can play. 

This is not a complete and polished game - but was used to incorporate Mirror and Unity to create and build the basics of a working MultiPlayer Game.  I created this game as part of a course on Multiplayer Games. 

Art assets are from Unity.
